message.name: ERR_LOCATIONRELATIONSHIP_XRV_RELATIONSHIP_CANCELLED
message.locale: This location relationship has already been canceled.
This location relationship has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_LOCATIONRELATIONSHIP_XRV_ENFORCE_CHILD
message.locale: You cannot cancel this relationship while other relationships use it.

message.name: ERR_LOCATIONRELATIONSHIP_XRV_LOCATION_ACTIVE
message.locale: %1s is currently active and is using this location relationship.

message.name: ERR_LOCATIONRELATIONSHIP_XRV_LOCATIONS_ACTIVE
message.locale: There are locations currently active and using this location relationship.

message.name: ERR_LOCATIONRELATIONSHIP_LOCATION_TYPE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: You cannot modify the location type.

message.name: ERR_LOCATIONRELATIONSHIP_PARENTTYPE_LOW
message.locale: The parent location type supplied must be at a higher level in the existing hierarchy.

message.name: ERR_ROOT_LOCATIONRELATIONSHIP_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED
message.locale: Location relationship with no parent location type must not be canceled.
Location relationship with no parent location type must not be cancelled.
